resources.string: This barcode must be 11 digit long. We calcul the checksum.
This barcode must begin with 0 or 1 and have 7 digit long. We calcul the checksum
This barcode must be 7 digit long. We calcul the checksum
This barcode must be 12 digit long. We calcul the checksum
This barcode can have 80 digit and character long. No special character. We calcul the checksum
This barcode can be anything bellow 9999 long. We calcul the checksum
